attributes.action: Investigate all members of parliament involved in the Panama Papers.
attributes.additional_details:
These Panama Papers have also exposed David Camerons father as having investments and just recently Cameron himself has admitted to having a stake in it, although having sold out before moving into downing st.
How can we allow people like this to run our country when they dodge paying taxes themselves? 
It should be investigated and anyone found guilty of tax evasion be dealt with accordingly by means of immediate resignation from parliament.
attributes.background: It has come to light in recent days of offshore accounts being used to avoid paying tax, which includes David Cameron. There should be a full investigation into why the people who are supposed to be getting the country back on its feet are dodging paying the very taxes that would help.
